means: 土生的动植物，土著，当地人

sentence.Network_en: Fortunately he soon made friends with an old indigene.
sentence.Network_cn: 幸运的是,他很快就和一个土著老人交上了朋友.

sentence.Network_en: On the other hand, they should benefit indigene, give feedback to local and seek mutual prosperity.
sentence.Network_cn: 另一方面, 也要造福当地人民, 回馈当地,寻求共同发展.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French indigène, from Latin indigena, from indi- (strengthened form of in- 'into') + an element related to gignere 'beget'

means.word_mean: 1. a person who was born in a particular place; an indigenous person
